amendment.description: To clarify that new paperwork and enrollment barriers are not created in the Express Lane Enrollment option and that income may be determined by Express Lane agencies based on State income tax records or returns.
amendment.purpose: To clarify that new paperwork and enrollment barriers are not created in the Express Lane Enrollment option and that income may be determined by Express Lane agencies based on State income tax records or returns.

action.text: Amendment SA 63 proposed by Senator Bingaman.

vote.text: Amendment SA 63 as modified agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 55 - 43. Record Vote Number: 29.

action.text: SA 63 previously adopted was further modified by Unanimous Consent.
